name: Dungeon D14
description:
You control a small colony in the underground of an unknown planet. Mine resources, build a base, explore the world and technology. Supply your colonists with oxygen, food and energy so that they can carry out their tasks.


Develop your base by building advanced factories and research new equipment for your colonists


Send colonists to get resources


Remove land to build more buildings


Explore the territory to find new resources


A wide variety of resources and goods for production

  • 20+ buildings
  • A wide variety of resources and goods for production
  • Colonists need oxygen, food and energy
  • Technology tree
  • The ability to control units in the RTS style
  • Procedural world generation
